name: MEMETYPER
description: MEMETYPER is a game in which you can check your typing skills. Learn about new memes or try to remember the old ones by typing their title to unlock description in meme encyclopedia.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 Ghz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ Compatible Card Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 1 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ Compatible Card Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
